theCoder:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theCoder:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theCoder:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theCoder:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theCoder:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theCoder:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theCoder:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theCoder:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theCoder:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theCoder:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theCoder:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theCoder:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theCoder:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

This is where my cards start -----------.DESCRIPTION: THIS IS JUST A MARKER TO SHOW WHERE MY ACTUAL CARDS START

theCoder:CardBasicBug.NAME: Basic Bug
theCoder:CardBasicBug.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable; NL When you draw this play it; Deal !M! damage to self and !D! to random enemy; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardIntermittentBug.NAME: Intermittent Bug
theCoder:CardIntermittentBug.DESCRIPTION: Does 1 randomly: NL Kill target non-boss enemy, Deal 20 damage, Give enemy 5 strength, Heal enemy for 20; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardForLoop.NAME: For Loop
theCoder:CardForLoop.DESCRIPTION: The next X cards are played twice; NL Exhaust;
theCoder:CardForLoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next X+1 cards are played twice; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardUpgradeSystems.NAME: Upgrade Systems
theCoder:CardUpgradeSystems.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! strength and dexterity; NL Insert 4 dazed into your draw pile;

theCoder:CardSort.NAME: Sort
theCoder:CardSort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate; NL Scry your draw pile;

theCoder:CardVirus.NAME: Virus
theCoder:CardVirus.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! weak and vulnerable; NL If the enemy dies, transfer all debuffs to a random enemy;

theCoder:CardImport.NAME: Import
theCoder:CardImport.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards to add to your hand; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardDarkMode.NAME: Dark Mode
theCoder:CardDarkMode.DESCRIPTION: Lose ability to see enemy intents; NL Gain !M! strength and dexterity;

theCoder:CardConditional.NAME: Conditional
theCoder:CardConditional.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! block; NL Else, deal !D! damage;

theCoder:CardBlueScreen.NAME: Blue Screen
theCoder:CardBlueScreen.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and insert 3 voids into your draw pile;

theCoder:CardBufferIndex.NAME: Buffer Array
theCoder:CardBufferIndex.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next thecoder:index {0,1,2,3,4} times you would lose HP;
theCoder:CardBufferIndex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next thecoder:index {1,2,3,4,5} times you would lose HP;

theCoder:CardDebuffIndex.NAME: Debuff Array
theCoder:CardDebuffIndex.DESCRIPTION: Apply thecoder:index {"1 weak", "1 vulnerable", "5 poison", "slow", "shifting exhaust"} to an enemy;
theCoder:CardDebuffIndex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply thecoder:index {"2 weak", "2 vulnerable", "7 poison", "slow", "shifting exhaust"} to an enemy;

theCoder:CardOverheat.NAME: Overheat
theCoder:CardOverheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage; NL Insert !M! burns into your discard pile;

theCoder:CardBuffIndex.NAME: Buff Array
theCoder:CardBuffIndex.DESCRIPTION: Gain thecoder:index {"1 artifact", "2 plated armor", "2 regen", "1 ritual", "1 intangible exhaust"};
theCoder:CardBuffIndex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain thecoder:index {"2 artifact", "4 plated armor", "4 regen", "2 ritual", "2 intangible exhaust"};

theCoder:CardManualIncrament.NAME: Manual Increment
theCoder:CardManualIncrament.DESCRIPTION: Always deal damage equal to twice your thecoder:index_value; Increase your thecoder:index_value by !M! (can exceed 4);

theCoder:CardFullyTraversed.NAME: Fully Traversed
theCoder:CardFullyTraversed.DESCRIPTION: If your thecoder:index_value is 4 or greater, gain !M! strength and dexterity. Else, increase thecoder:index_value by !M! (can exceed 4);

theCoder:CardIntigerOverflow.NAME: Integer Overflow
theCoder:CardIntigerOverflow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and permanently increase this by !M! block; NL If this card exceeds 20 block, reset it to 2;

theCoder:CardStackOverflow.NAME: Stack Overflow
theCoder:CardStackOverflow.DESCRIPTION: Everything you'll ever need; NL Draw !M! cards; NL Deal !D! damage; NL Gain !B! block;

theCoder:CardDebug.NAME: Debug
theCoder:CardDebug.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card; NL If it was a curse or status card, gain 1 strength and dexterity;
theCoder:CardDebug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card; NL If it was a curse or status card, gain 1 strength, dexterity, and artifact;

theCoder:CardTechieForm.NAME: Techie Form
theCoder:CardTechieForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal; NL At the of end of your turn, deal thecoder:index {3,5,8,13,21} to ALL enemies;
theCoder:CardTechieForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the of end of your turn, deal thecoder:index {3,5,8,13,21} to ALL enemies;

theCoder:CardOverwork.NAME: Overwork
theCoder:CardOverwork.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards; NL Gain [E] [E] [E] ; NL Gain !M! strength and dexterity; NL Die next turn; NL Exhaust;
theCoder:CardOverwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain; NL Draw !M! cards; NL Gain [E] [E] [E] ; NL Gain !M! strength and dexterity; NL Die next turn; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardRestart.NAME: Restart
theCoder:CardRestart.DESCRIPTION: Everyone heals !M! and removes all powers; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardNull.NAME: Null
theCoder:CardNull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage; NL Gain !M! block; NL Draw !M! cards; NL All values scale with only strength and dexterity;
theCoder:CardNull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage; NL Gain !M! block; NL Draw !M! cards; NL All values scale with only strength, dexterity, and thecoder:index_value;

theCoder:CardUnrealiablePower.NAME: Unreliable Power
theCoder:CardUnrealiablePower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] ; NL Insert 0 to !M! voids into your discard pile;

theCoder:CardMalware.NAME: Malware
theCoder:CardMalware.DESCRIPTION: Everyone loses !M! strength this turn; NL Insert a dazed into your draw pile; NL Exhaust;

theCoder:CardPython.NAME: Python
theCoder:CardPython.DESCRIPTION: More SPAM??? NL Deal !D! damage NL Apply !M! poison

theCoder:CardJava.NAME: Java
theCoder:CardJava.DESCRIPTION: Drink some coffee; NL Deal !D! damage and apply the same amount of thecoder:boiling to an enemy;

theCoder:CardPointer.NAME: [IN PROCESS] Pointer
theCoder:CardPointer.DESCRIPTION: [IN PROCESS] On pick up, choose another card in your deck. This becomes a copy. Upgrading resets pointer. Currently points to

theCoder:CardKillall9.NAME: [TESTING] Killall -9
theCoder:CardKillall9.DESCRIPTION: [TESTING] Kill all processes immediately; Test Custom Variable: index {!theCoder:TEST_VAR!,!theCoder:TEST_VAR!,!theCoder:TEST_VAR!};
